data.lyric:
[ti:Perfect (Explicit)]
[ar:Logic]
[al:No Pressure (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Perfect (Explicit) - Logic
[00:03.89]Lyrics by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Arjun Ivatury/Keanu Torres/Michael Mule/Isaac DeBoni
[00:07.78]Composed by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Arjun Ivatury/Keanu Torres/Michael Mule/Isaac DeBoni
[00:11.67]B***h I did it I made it I'm loved and I'm hated
[00:14.78]I started from the bottom now my neighborhood is gated
[00:17.68]They say "Drink to your accomplishments" so every night I'm faded
[00:20.67]Feel like every other day me and somebody new related
[00:23.65]You're my sister cousin brother from the other side
[00:26.12]The other side
[00:26.88]Well I don't know who told you that
[00:28.49]My mama
[00:28.91]Well she f**king lied
[00:29.73]Ayy wake up wake up get your cake up
[00:31.58]Cut it up like it's c*****e shake up
[00:32.97]All the streets with all these beats
[00:34.33]I body beats I'm not discreet
[00:35.56]Per-Per-Perfect
[00:36.21]This is how I feel on the inside
[00:38.59]All you non-talent rappin' motherf**kers better run and hide
[00:41.88]You worthless you have no purpose f**kin' imposter
[00:44.78]You gots to get it through your head
[00:46.92]You won't ever get no handout
[00:48.82]F**kin' with your a*s it'd be like throwing a band out
[00:52.68]Per-Per-Perfect
[00:53.90]My flow increased my dough increased
[00:55.38]You know I leave them all deceased
[00:56.87]I am a f**king beast I'm from the East
[00:58.87]I keep the peace don't need a piece
[01:00.18]But I keep a piece got it capiche
[01:01.69]That boy gon' eat this is a feast
[01:03.25]Once I release I'm smokin' trees
[01:04.84]I bought my s**t I don't need no lease
[01:06.22]So f**k you up like Master P
[01:07.62]Perfect
[01:07.85]This s**t right here a masterpiece I'm comin' in hot like the police
[01:10.74]Shooting my shot like the police
[01:12.30]All on the block like the policemen who gon'
[01:14.52]Stop stop
[01:14.88]The police from leaving bodies in the motherf**kin streets man
[01:18.14]Fire Per-Per-Perfect
[01:30.12]Logic cites Nujabes MF Doom RZA
[01:35.30]And Kanye West as key inspiration behind his production style
data.trans:
[ti:Perfect (Explicit)]
[ar:Logic]
[al:No Pressure (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.89]//
[00:07.78]//
[00:11.67]碧池 我做到了 我成功了 我被人爱 我被人恨
[00:14.78]我白手起家 现在我住在豪华社区里
[00:17.68]他们说 为你的成就干杯 于是我每天晚上都醉醺醺的
[00:20.67]感觉每一天 我都会有新亲戚
[00:23.65]你是我的远房姐妹 表亲 兄弟吗
[00:26.12]远房
[00:26.88]我不知道谁跟你说的
[00:28.49]我妈妈
[00:28.91]她胡扯
[00:29.73]醒一醒 醒一醒 把你收获的一切
[00:31.58]拿出来与大家分享
[00:32.97]街头响起美妙的节奏
[00:34.33]我的身体在跳动 我不是个谨慎的人
[00:35.56]完美
[00:36.21]这就是我内心的感受
[00:38.59]你们这些没天赋的说唱歌手最好赶紧逃跑 躲起来
[00:41.88]你们一点用都没有 你们没有目标 就是可恶的骗子
[00:44.78]你得动动自己的脑子 去得到想要的一切
[00:46.92]你得不到别人的施舍
[00:48.82]你得自己行动起来 拿出你全部的实力
[00:52.68]完美
[00:53.90]我的音乐越来越好 我的财富越来越多
[00:55.38]你知道 我会让他们都无力回天
[00:56.87]我就是个野兽 我来自东部
[00:58.87]我维护和平 不需要项链
[01:00.18]但我带着武器 你明白吗
[01:01.69]那小子得吃饭 这就是一场盛宴
[01:03.25]一旦我发新歌 我就要抽点那种东西
[01:04.84]我的东西都是买的 我不需要租来的
[01:06.22]所以去你的吧 就像Master P
[01:07.62]完美
[01:07.85]这就是杰作 我风风火火地到来 就像警察一样
[01:10.74]像警察一样开枪射击
[01:12.30]就像警察一样在街头游走 谁能
[01:14.52]阻止
[01:14.88]他让街头变得血流成河
[01:18.14]如火一般 完美
[01:30.12]Logic提起了Nujabes和MF Doom 以及RZA
[01:35.30]还有Kanye West 这些给了他很多创作灵感
